empty_subscriptions: Educators you subscribe to will appear here.
empty_blocked_users: Your blocked users will appear here.
empty_saved_reels: You haven’t saved any eduClips yet.

cancel_subscription.headline: Unsubscribe
cancel_subscription.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You’ll have exclusive access until <strong>{{expirationDate}}<strong>.

cancel_subscription_success.headline: You’ve Unsubscribed
cancel_subscription_success.description: You’ll still have exclusive access until <strong>{{expirationDate}}<strong>.

successful_subscription.headline: You’ve Subscribed
successful_subscription.description: Congratulations! You now have exclusive access to all of {{creatorName}}’s reels.

successful_resume_subscription.headline: Subscription Resumed!
successful_resume_subscription.description: Congratulations! You now have exclusive access to all of {{creatorName}}’s reels.

report.headline: Report
report.description: Are you sure you want to report this {{type}}?
report.error: An error occurred while submitting the report.

account_blocked: Your account has been blocked. <underline>Learn why your account is blocked and how to resolve it.</underline>

blocked_user.headline: Block User
blocked_user.description: This action can’t be undone. Their subscription will be canceled, and they will no longer have the option to resubscribe. If applicable, a prorated refund will be provided for the unused portion of their billing period. You can learn more about blocking users <underline>here</underline>.

post_removed.headline: Your Post Was Removed
post_removed.description: We removed your post because it violated our <underline>Content Guidelines</underline>. If you violate our guidelines again, your account may be permanently disabled.

post_restored.headline: Post Restored
post_restored.description: Your appeal has been processed. After further review, your post has been restored.
post_restored.details: We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and appreciate your patience.

post_deleted.headline: Post Deleted
post_deleted.description: Your appeal has been processed. After further review, it has been determined that your post violates our <underline>Content Guidelines</underline>, and it has been permanently deleted.
post_deleted.details: We appreciate your understanding and encourage you to continue creating content in line with our <underline>Content Guidelines</underline>.

submit_appeal.headline: Appeal Removal
submit_appeal.description: Your post will be carefully reviewed again. If it’s determined that your post follows our <underline>Content Guidelines</underline>, it will be restored. If it violates our <underline>Content Guidelines</underline>, it will be permanently deleted and you won’t be able to appeal it again.

appeal_submitted.headline: Appeal Submitted
appeal_submitted.description: You have submitted an appeal and your post is being carefully reviewed again. You will be notified as soon as a decision is made. Appeals are typically processed within 24hrs.
